title: Lazada Customers Insight Monthly Report
description: Monthly report providing key insights into customer behavior and financial metrics on Lazada

Date.description: Date of the report in the format 'MM-DD-YYYY'

Conversion_Rate.description: Conversion rate as a percentage for the month

Orders.description: Total number of orders for the month

Buyers.description: Total number of unique buyers for the month

New_buyers.description: Number of new buyers for the month

Existing_buyers.description: Number of existing buyers for the month

Average_order_value.description: Average order value information for the month

Average_basket_size.description: Average basket size for the month
